description: Section 73 application to vary condition 2 (approved plans) to include: new laundry room; cycle store reconfigured; new utility cupboards; reconfigured bin store; new gas metre room; new services intake room; covered entrance to apartments; curve to staircase removed and squared off; existing 3 bed apartment to level 5 split into two apartments, attached to planning permission 18/02527/FUL dated 11th October 2018 which granted full planning permission for:"Demolition of existing building and erection of new 6 storey building comprising retail floorspace at ground floor and 5 storeys of serviced apartments (C1 use class) accommodation above (124 - 126 The Grove)"   (Application site is located within the Stratford St.Johns Conservation Area and affects the setting of The Grade II Listed Church of St John the Evangelist and its Grade II Listed Railings).
